text: "Take the red pill and enter an express elevator descending into the neo-gnostic sub-basement of your religious tradition, or take the blue pill and there were some feverish supernatural dreams but they're over and mostly forgotten now."
an interesting and non-trivial problem, though

Only insofar as traditional library science and info retrieval problems were closer to artificial intelligence problems than has been widely understood. (LLMs are scarcely less convincing as psychotherapists than as librarians.)
